__e: I know you expected the promotion to Head Strategist... and over the years, I've indicated that the job might one day be yours... but you're a field man.
Gets promoted back to detective, have a little peace before they lower him into the ground.

Then I got a promotion, and the desk closest to the door.
Well, it won't be so bad, you know, if I get my promotion all right and get on.

And not only did he get away with it, he got promoted for it.
